descriptionHtml:
The Hammer Of The Gods

When U Hit Your Enemies With This Hammer They Are Going To Fly.
You Will Have To Recharge It Once In A While With Soul Gems.
If There Is No Charge It Is A Normal Hammer But With Weaker Damage Rating.
This Is For Knocking People Around For Fun, Not Killing Them.

Put The File In The Skyrim Data Folder

How To Add: 

Press The Key Under Esc (The Tilde Key ~)
Type player.additem 06000d64 1

(Replace The Frist 2 Numbers With The Load Number That The Mod Is When U Installed It)

Exit Console Menu

UPDATE: A Craftable Version

It Can Now Be Crafted At The Skyforge
You Need The Glass Smithing Perk
author: JP0005

files.name: The Hammer Of The Gods - Craftable
